original: AHLQUIST, Hugo Gottfrid Edvard, Urmakare, Exam. optiker, Karlshamn, t Khn 1/11 08 av urmak K A o h h, gm Anna-Margareta Thyme. Lärov.stud, urmak.sk i Sthlm, prakt h urmak Cederberg Vinslöv o C Johansson Tollarp, h Nilsche & Giinter Optische Werke AG Tyskl, Jenaer Fachhochsch f Optiker Jena 38. Disp h Karl Ahlquists Ur- o Optiska aff Khn sed. 32, deläg dna samt Fma »Uret» E Paulssons Eftr. Odd Fellow. Hobbies: Musik, tennis, filateli.
translated: AHLQUIST, Hugo Gottfrid Edvard, Watchmaker, Certified Optician, Karlshamn, born on November 1, 1908, son of watchmaker K.A. and his wife H.H., married to Anna-Margareta Thyme. Studied at a watchmaking school in Stockholm, trained at watchmaker Cederberg in Vinslöv and C. Johansson in Tollarp, and at Nilsche & Günter Optische Werke AG in Germany. Attended Jenaer Fachhochschule for Opticians in Jena in 1938. Employed at Karl Ahlquists Watch and Optical Store since 1932, became co-owner and then sole owner. Also associated with "Uret" E. Paulsson's Estate and the Odd Fellow organization. Hobbies: Music, tennis, philately.

structured.name: Hugo Gottfrid Edvard Ahlquist

worksFor.name: Karl Ahlquists Watch and Optical Store

structured.description: Hugo Gottfrid Edvard Ahlquist was a Swedish watchmaker and certified optician. He was born on November 1, 1908, in Karlshamn. Hugo studied at Stockholm Watchmaking School and later attended Jenaer Fachhochschule for Opticians in Jena in 1938. He worked at Karl Ahlquists Watch and Optical Store from 1932, initially as an employee, later becoming a co-owner and eventually the sole owner. Hugo was also associated with Uret E. Paulsson's Estate and was a member of the Odd Fellow organization. His hobbies included music, tennis, and philately. Hugo was married to Anna-Margareta Thyme.

career.workplace: Karl Ahlquists Ur- o Optiska aff

career.occupational_title: Trained at Nilsche & Günter Optische Werke AG
